name: Capico (beta)
description:
Capico is a scrappy shooter roughly based on Super Mario Sunshine bonus levels and paintball. 

It's currently in beta and has 7 levels to try out. 

controls:

wasd or arrow keys to move 
space to jump
right click to aim
left click while aiming to fire
use your mouse to rotate view and pan in/out
r to reload

enjoy!
